column4: Hello, I have a network that consist of 2 laptops Jesus and Shiva (both ubuntu), a tower Yahweh (Kubuntu stores all of my media) and a PS3, Xbox 360 and a Wii. I want to serve media from my Kubuntu box to my laptops and my PS3. Does anyone know what I can do?

Hello, I have a network that consist of 2 laptops Jesus and Shiva (both ubuntu), a tower Yahweh (Kubuntu stores all of my media) and a PS3, Xbox 360 and a Wii. I want to serve media from my Kubuntu box to my laptops and my PS3. Does anyone know what I can do?
you need a upnp server, you can select one via / system / admin / synaptic, search for upnp or dlna
